body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger               Be A Junior Ranger                   Celebrate National Jr. Ranger Day, April 16!               Join us for one of our special Jr. Ranger Days!         Â        Wolf Trap's Junior Ranger Patch NPS  Junior Rangers can help protect and preserve Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts by learning about why Wolf Trap is so special. Booklets are available for a variety of ages. Each booklet contains fun activities that help kids learn about Wolf Trap and the National Park Service. Complete the age appropriate half of the booklet and receive the official Wolf Trap Junior Ranger patch or badge! Booklets are free. Pick up an Activity Booklet at these locations: - Ranger Station (all year) - Kiosk in the meadow (on days when shows are presented at the Children's Theatre-in-the-Woods)
